With extensive experience as a Shopify Plus partner, our Shopify development agency stays ahead of industry trends and best practices, helping you maintain a competitive edge.

AgencyDescription.title: People-first agency
AgencyDescription.text1: We are a highly skilled, multi-disciplinary Shopify agency dedicated to delivering innovative, data-driven ecommerce solutions and exceptional customer experiences. At the heart of our work is a people-first philosophy that values trust, independence, and personal growth. This approach creates an open environment where our team feels empowered to challenge conventions and deliver the best outcomes for our merchants.
AgencyDescription.text2: Our remote-first culture encourages creative freedom by avoiding micromanagement, allowing our specialists to think outside the box and go the extra mile. We place equal importance on the experience of our merchants and our team members, fostering a supportive community that genuinely cares. This strong foundation of people-first values sets us apart and enables us to bring exceptional personal and commercial value to every project we undertake.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose crocode?
whyChooseUs.description: Creative collaboration underpins everything we do as Shopify Experts in London. We build close-working relationships with our clients and partners to work with goals in mind whilst offering a wealth of digital expertise. From startup-ups to world-leading brands, we deliver ecommerce strategies to deliver Shopify & Shopify Plus stores that perform.

card1.text: We go beyond standard solutions to create Shopify stores that challenge the conventions of design and technical capability. Our goal is not just to implement features, but to create a digital experience that delights your customers and gives you a real competitive advantage.

card2.text: We believe that great decisions come from data, not guesses. Our team delves into your store's analytics to identify growth points, optimize the user experience, and increase conversion. We build not just websites, but powerful tools for scaling your business.

card3.text: Our work doesn't end on launch day. We become your long-term technical partners, ensuring your store runs smoothly, providing prompt support, and helping you adapt to new challenges. Your success is our success, and we are committed to supporting you at every step of the way.

card4.text: As certified Shopify and Shopify Plus experts, we have an in-depth understanding of the platform. This allows us to recommend the most effective and modern solutions, leverage best practices, and avoid common pitfalls, saving you time and budget.

openGraph.title: Shopify eCommerce Development FAQs — Crocode
openGraph.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about Shopify projects: Shopify Plus, custom themes, app development, Hydrogen, SEO, and migrations. Learn how Crocode helps brands grow with Shopify.

item1.question: What is Shopify and why is it the best platform for eCommerce businesses?
item1.answer: Shopify is a powerful eCommerce platform that allows brands to launch, manage, and scale online stores with ease. It offers a user-friendly admin, secure payments, built-in analytics, and thousands of apps to extend functionality — making it perfect for both startups and enterprise-level businesses.

item2.question: What’s the difference between Shopify and Shopify Plus?
item2.answer: Shopify Plus is designed for high-volume merchants and global brands. It provides advanced automation, deeper customization, API access, and dedicated support. If your business processes large numbers of orders or operates internationally, Shopify Plus is the ideal choice.

item3.question: Do you develop custom Shopify themes?
item3.answer:
Yes. Our team designs and develops custom Shopify themes from scratch to perfectly match your brand identity and improve user experience.

We also optimize existing Shopify themes for performance, SEO, and conversion rate improvement.

item4.question: Can you build a custom Shopify app for my store?
item4.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in Shopify app development, creating private or public apps that integrate seamlessly with your store’s functionality — from marketing automation and custom checkout flows to inventory management and data synchronization.

item5.question: What is Shopify Hydrogen, and do you work with it?
item5.answer:
Shopify Hydrogen is a modern React-based framework for building headless Shopify stores. It provides full control over the storefront experience, allowing for high-speed, custom eCommerce experiences.

We develop Hydrogen-based Shopify solutions for brands that need performance, scalability, and design freedom.

item6.question: Do you offer migration services to Shopify?
item6.answer:
Yes, we handle complete Shopify migrations from platforms like WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, or PrestaShop.

We ensure all products, customers, and orders are transferred securely — preserving SEO rankings and URLs to maintain your store’s organic traffic.

item7.question: Do you provide SEO and speed optimization for Shopify stores?
item7.answer:
Yes. We apply advanced Shopify SEO optimization techniques — structured data, image compression, meta tags, and Core Web Vitals improvement.

Our goal is to make your Shopify store fast, mobile-friendly, and highly ranked in search engines.

item8.question: Do you offer post-launch support and maintenance?
item8.answer: Yes. We provide ongoing Shopify support, theme updates, app management, and performance monitoring to ensure your store keeps running smoothly and growing consistently.

item9.question: What types of businesses do you work with?
item9.answer:
We partner with eCommerce brands, D2C startups, and enterprise retailers looking to build or scale their Shopify stores.

Whether it’s a custom Shopify app, a full rebranding, or a migration project, our team tailors every solution to your goals.

item10.question: Why choose your team for Shopify development?
item10.answer:
We’re a team of certified Shopify experts specializing in Shopify, Shopify Plus, Themes, Apps, and Hydrogen.

Our projects focus on performance, scalability, and design excellence — helping eCommerce brands grow faster and sell more efficiently.
